citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The written program of veterinary care and a current list of animals-on-hand were not available at time of inspection. The
required paperwork is essential for tracking of animals at the facility and to ensure an established program of care for
them has been approved by a qualified veterinarian. During an inspection, the required records should be made available
for review.
To be corrected by February 15, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The written program of veterinary care and  a current list of animals-on-hand were not available at time of inspection. The 
required paperwork is essential for tracking of animals at the facility and to ensure an established program of care for 
them has been approved by a qualified veterinarian. During an inspection, the required records should be made available 
for review. 
 
To be corrected by February 15, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
